public class AccSetEditor

An AccSetEditor is an editor for editing an acceptance set.

Method Detail

getChangedSet

public StateSet getChangedSet()
Returns the states changed their acceptance in this editor, that is, states becoming accepting from unaccepting or becoming unaccepting from accepting.

Returns:
the states changed their acceptance in this editor

display

public static StateSet display(UIDialog owner,
                               Automaton aut,
                               StateSet set)
Displays this dialog for an owner dialog, an acceptance set to be edited in this dialog, and an automaton with acceptance condition containing the acceptance set.

Parameters:
owner - an owner dialog of this editor
aut - an automaton with acceptance condition containing the acceptance set set
set - an acceptance set to be edited in this editor
Returns:
the states changed their acceptance in this editor
